issue.title: [C++] Support RapidJSON<1.1.0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4762](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4762). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To support building with as many system packages as possible, we should support RapidJSON<1.1.0. For example the distribution provided RapidJSON on Ubuntu Xenial is `0.12~git20141031-3`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4762?focusedCommentId=16931664) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
RapidJSON is header-only, right? Perhaps we can simply have Xenial users use our "bundled" version.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4762?focusedCommentId=17026750) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Do we want to keep this open? RapidJSON 1.1.0 was released on 25 Aug 2016, almost 3.5 years ago.
